doc.title: Bar Bound
doc.plot: It's a slow night at the neighborhood bar, and Gigi and Lili decide to lock-up early and go dancing. Before they can leave, a masked, shotgun-wielding thug enters, ties them up, dragging them into the rear of the building. Before the thug can clean out the cash-register, pretty Andrea shows up for a nightcap and she, too, is grabbed. When the villain leaves with the cash, which of the ladies will join him as an unwilling girl toy?
